duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver exceptional customer service and ensure a "5-Star" experience for every customer.
Act as the face of the company, explaining the product and guiding customers through timelines and expectations.
Engage and form genuine connections with customers to keep them excited about their journey to a more confident smile.
Utilize cutting-edge technology to create a 3D scan of customer’s teeth for the company's Licensed Dental Professionals to review.
Assist customers in selecting the best payment plan for their budget and provide complimentary whitening, offering guidance on usage.
Work with teammates to create a positive, high-energy atmosphere and contribute to additional responsibilities as needed for the success of the SmileShop.

education_certification.credential: Sales and Customer Service experience, preferably in a retail sales setting
